entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tatamagouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.7°C

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow or rain. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to rain late in the morning then to freezing rain or ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
